description.0: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

0.0: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by <cryo>10%</cryo> for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once every 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has: The CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of Normal and Plunging Attacks increase by <cryo>1%/8%</cryo> respectively, up to a maximum of <cryo>3.2%/25.6%</cryo>, and at the same time, all other party members gain an All Elemental DMG Bonus of <cryo>8%</cryo>, up to a maximum of <cryo>25.6%</cryo>, for 15s. Elemental DMG Bonuses gained by characters in this way cannot stack.
